high_descs: Turn left and take a tiny step forward then turn left and take a step forward then turn left and walk to the desk then turn right and walk to the bed.
Pick up the purple pillow that's closest to you.
Turn left to face the light on the desk.
Turn on the light on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Inspect a pillow by lamp light.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the foot of the bed.
Pick up the purple pillow closest to the foot of the bed.
anns.task_desc: Look at a pillow by the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the bed to the left ahead.
Pick up the purple pillow near the end of the bed on the left side.
Turn left to face the small lamp on the right corner of the wooden desk.
Turn on the small lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pillow by the light of a small lamp.
